name: Quality Suites Pioneer Sands

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2014, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a 1 night stay following coastal drive from Melbourne prior to moving on to Blue Mountains. As previous reviewer had said very spacious apartments. Excellent facilities with all kitchen facilities. Found air conditioning only in lounge a little odd but soon had right room temperatures throughout apartment.
reviews.title: Much better than expected and wished we had booked longer

reviews.text: Breakfast was very good and again better than expected.
reviews.title: nice apartment

reviews.text: There was some basic maintenance issues which we notified to reception but never cause us an issue. It was a good area and in hindsight we would have stayed an extra night.
reviews.title: Unbelievable Value

reviews.text: The one bedroom suite we stayed in was surprisingly spacious. It's modern with very good shower. It was clean on first sight but some of the dishes and glasses were little bit dirty. We stayed for 5 nights and paid more that in Sydney. It could be because it was over Christmas. It was rather strange to ask every time for shower gel and shampoo because it was not given to us when the housekeeping was done.
reviews.title: Good Value

description: Wollongong's newest boutique accommodation & conference and events destination for 2010 and beyond - The Quality Suites Pioneer Sands - is ideally located on the Sydney side of Wollongong at only 55 minutes drive from Sydney Airport. Be one of the first to enjoy our contemporary one and two bedroom serviced apartments with large open plan space flowing onto balconies with ocean, escarpment or Wollongong skyline views. All apartments feature modern finishes, Austar cable on LCD TV's, internet, air conditioning and fully self contained kitchen facilities. Other facilities include a cafe, outdoor pool, gym spa and sauna, and onsite business services. This new coastal retreat could be your next business stop over.
